channel.title: Sub patches saving and opening
channel.description:
I'm probably being really stupid but.... I've saved a simple synth as saw2 test.axs. I open a new patch and save its as saw2 poly.axp in the same directory. I then open the new object finder and type _/saw2 test and it doesnt find it.
What am I doing wrong?

item.title: Sub patches saving and opening
item.dc:creator: @ejr27233 Edgar John Robinson
item.description:
@ejr27233 wrote:

Thats sorted it!
Many thanks.
Are you trying to set some sort of world record for customer support?

Read full topic

item.title: Sub patches saving and opening
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

it would be ./saw2test
(by the way I avoid spaces in names, I think it works, but would need to double check)
more in user guide section

Read full topic
